mapper.select: SELECT ppp.*, d.dname FROM (SELECT count(*) AS cnts, pp.deptid FROM (SELECT * FROM PROJECT p WHERE p.deadline>= to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')) pp GROUP BY pp.deptid) ppp, dept d WHERE ppp.deptid=d.deptid
SELECT owner, round(avg(PROGRESS)*100,1) AS avgs FROM gantt WHERE prjno=#{prjno} GROUP BY owner ORDER BY avgs DESC
SELECT round(avg(progress)*100,0) AS avgs FROM gantt WHERE prjno=#{prjno}

SELECT d.MONTH,p.tot,p.cnt FROM (SELECT TO_NUMBER(substr(deadline,6,2)) AS months ,sum(amount) AS tot,count(prjno) AS cnt FROM PROJECT WHERE TO_NUMBER(substr(deadline,0,4))=#{year} GROUP BY TO_NUMBER(substr(deadline,6,2))) p, (SELECT ROWNUM month FROM DUAL CONNECT BY 12>=LEVEL) d WHERE d.month =p.months(+) ORDER BY d.month
SELECT sum(amount) AS tot FROM PROJECT WHERE TO_NUMBER(substr(deadline,0,4))=#{year}
